body: I like to program. In perl All the time. Except when I watch tv, work, listen to music, watch the birds in the park, jog, chat, read facebook updates, read books or sleep. You can find more information about me from my linkedin profile or my curriculum vitae. Want to know more? Ask google. In the future I hope to: Become a better blogger. Like a blogger who actually blog. Once every now and then. Read up on what's happening in the world. Have time to do nothing. Want to get in touch? Send me an email or poke me on irc.perl.org, where my nick is batman. ## Projects Complete list of projects from github or cpan. * snippets - small pieces of something * garmin-auto-import - import Gar min data in gnome * sibs - simple incremental backup script * Online DOCSIS config file editor
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: jhthorsen
